item.title: 如果刚果允许扩大石油钻探，那么村庄、热带雨林，甚至是世界上最稀有的大猩猩栖息的国家公园的部分区域都可能面临危险。
item.description:
Villages, rainforests, and even parts of a national park that is home to some of the world’s rarest gorillas could be at risk if Congo permits expanded oil drilling. pic.twitter.com/NjJZ2BqmNa

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 3, 2024
